price: 13. Et ce jour-là, l’homme sera informé de ce qu’il aura avancé (comme acte) et de ce qu’il aura renvoyé à plus tard.
arabic: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yunabba-u al-insānu yawma-idhin bimā qaddama wa-akhara
